resources.string: This app is a university course project, designed to help you fall asleep easier with the help of a variety of soothing white-noise sounds to drown otu all of one\'s inner thoughts. You can also personalize the sleeping excercise by adding your own audio files from the local device.
This is an open-source, non-commercial project developed for educational purposes. Do with it what you will.
Built with Jetpack Compose, Kotlin, Room database, Datastore, and MediaPlayer.
This app is provided as-is, without warranty. It is not intended for medical use and should not replace professional advice.
